data.title: Horizon Education Network – Changing the future of theological education today
data.text:
On April 18, Andriy* finally embraced his wife, three sons, daughter-in-law, and only grandchild after a long and harrowing journey. God had reunited his family in a place of refuge and safety. As Andriy looked into his wife’s eyes, he was reminded of God’s providence, even in the midst of dire circumstances. In February, Russian…

Read More

Over the years, Horizon Education Network has built relationships with evangelical schools in many countries. Some of these partners serve in Ukraine, where war is being waged. Another partner in Moldova, a country bordering Ukraine, welcomes and serves refugees on their campus. The news reports of the crisis are difficult to watch, and the updates…

Read More

The concept of networking has always been a key component of the vision of Horizon. In fact, the mission of Horizon is “to partner with national theological schools to equip ministry leaders through online learning and digital resource development in their own language and culture for global service.” In keeping with this mission, Horizon Education…

Read More
